apiDoc.name: ZapSendClassic
apiDoc.description: Classic zap sending interface with preset amounts, comment input, and send/cancel actions. Features preset amount buttons (21, 100, 1000, 5000, 10000 sats), comment textarea, target user display with avatar, and success/cancel callbacks. Uses createZapSendAction builder for payment processing.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: target
props.description: Event or user to send zap to

props.name: onsuccess
props.description: Callback when zap is sent successfully

props.name: oncancel
props.description: Callback when zap send is cancelled
